title: Spacious 3-br Apt For Rent
posting_body: Spacious eat-in kitchen with granite countertop
Walking distance to Malden High School
An assigned parking space and convenient street parking
On the bus line, minutes away from the Malden Orange Line T stop
Walk score of 85, Close to grocery shopping, downtown Malden, bars and restaurants
If interested please reply with some basic info about the # of people to move in, date, and employment status.
Would check credit, criminal, and eviction records for prospective tenants.
1st month, last month, and Security due to move in.
No smoking or vaping, No pets.
Good Section 8 tenants are welcome and the rent would be based on the Payment Standard provided by Section 8.
